title: Surface recommendation conflicts in Segment Positioning UI

sections.text: Update the Segment Positioning view to consume the conflict metadata returned by the API and visually flag recommendations that are in conflict with other segments. Add a compact conflict indicator per recommendation category with a drill-in panel listing the conflicting segments and statements. Ensure the UI gracefully handles missing/empty conflict metadata (feature off or older workspaces) without breaking existing recommendation rendering.
